评论详情: I really loved this ring…at first. I ordered it on July 8th and I’ve already returned it on July 25th. I ordered the gold color. I only wore this ring twice and in that very short time the inner part of the ring was still gold in color, but the outer part had lost all its gold color. I never showered with it on or anything. You would have thought that the inner part that touches your skin would’ve started to change first, but that’s not the case. It’s a really well made ring, but the gold layering isn’t the best. I have other items that are gold over sterling silver that I paid less for and are still going strong with the  color and I wear those items all day, everyday! Sadly, this one went back. 😔

This is definitely not Silver as stated. False advertising. I cleaned this with silver cleaner and it turned black. I used the same cleaner for other silver jewelry and this has never happened before. BE AWARE!

I needed a ring for work, as I kept throwing away my silicone ones when I took my gloves off/washed my hands. This one fits well! It’s a simple silver, just like my regular wedding set. It’s a cheaper feeling ring, but I don’t mind since I won’t be upset if I lose or scratch the ring. I bought it to keep something on my finger!
se guallo y se puso negro , no es plata real.
I love the way it fits.

评论概述: It tarnished.  Looks like a brass ring instead of silver.
评论详情: Didn't like that the silver "finish" wore off and made the ring look like brass.  Liked wearing it as an accent ring on my thumb.  Just bummed out that the color turned.  But, the fit was good.
Good quality silver looks like white gold good fit

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: Just as pictured.  Happy with my purchase
